required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of JNJ-53718678 in Adult and Adolescent Participants Who Had a Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation and Who Are Infected With Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Evaluate the Clinical Outcomes, Antiviral Activity, Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of JNJ-53718678 in Adult and Adolescent Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplant Recipients With Respiratory Syncytial Virus Infection of the Upper Respiratory Tract

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of JNJ-53718678 on the development of respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) lower respiratory tract infection (LRTIs) in adult hematopoietic stem cell transplant (HSCT) recipients with RSV upper RTI.

detailed_description.textblock: RSV is recognized as major respiratory pathogen in infants and young children and causes upper and lower respiratory illness among all age groups, often going undiagnosed. Immunocompromised (IC) participants have a reduced ability to combat infection due to an impaired or weakened immune system. Within the IC population, HSCT recipients are generally regarded as having a particularly high risk for more severe disease caused by RSV, representing a substantial unmet need for antiviral treatment of RSV infections in this participant population. JNJ-53718678 is an investigational, potent, small molecule, respiratory syncytial virus (RSV)-specific fusion inhibitor. The study will include a Screening Period (Day -2 to Day 1), a Treatment Period (Day 1 to Day 21), and a Follow-up Period (1 year). Assessments like chest X-ray, pulse/heart rate, respiratory rate, electrocardiogram (ECG), etc will be performed. Safety and efficacy will be assessed through the study. The total study duration for each participant will be approximately 49 days.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants who Develop Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) Lower Respiratory Tract Infection (LRTI)
primary_outcome.description: The proportion of participants who develop RSV LRTI through Visit Day 28 per the Endpoint Adjudication Committee (EAC) assessment will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants who Develop RSV-associated Lower Respiratory Tract Complication (LRTC)
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of participants who develop RSV-associated LRTC through Visit Day 28 per the EAC's assessment will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.description: An AE is any untoward medical occurrence in a participant who received study drug without regard to possibility of causal relationship.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Abnormal Clinical Laboratory Findings
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants with abnormal clinical laboratory findings will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Abnormal Electrocardiograms (ECGs) Findings
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants with abnormal ECGs findings will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Abnormal Vital Signs Findings
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants with abnormal vital signs findings will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Progressing to Respiratory Failure (of any Cause) Requiring Mechanical Ventilation (Invasive or Noninvasive) and/or Death, in Participants who Develop RSV LRTI or RSV-associated LRTC per the EAC's Assessment
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of participants progressing to respiratory failure (of any cause) requiring mechanical ventilation (invasive or noninvasive) and/or death, in participants who develop RSV LRTI or RSV-associated LRTC per the EAC's assessment will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Progressing to Respiratory Failure (of any Cause) Requiring Mechanical Ventilation (Invasive or Noninvasive) and/or Death, (all-cause Mortality)
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants progressing to respiratory failure (of any cause) requiring mechanical ventilation (invasive or noninvasive) and/or death, (all-cause mortality) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Progressing to Death (All-cause Mortality), in Participants who Develop RSV LRTI or RSV-associated LRTC per the EAC's Assessment
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants progressing to death (all-cause mortality), in participants who develop RSV LRTI or RSV-associated LRTC per the EAC's assessment will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Progressing to Death (All-cause Mortality)
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants progressing to death (all-cause mortality) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Progressing to Respiratory Failure (of any Cause) Requiring Mechanical Ventilation (Invasive or Noninvasive), in Participants who Develop RSV LRTI or RSV-associated LRTC per the EAC's Assessment
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants progressing to respiratory failure (of any cause) requiring mechanical ventilation (invasive or noninvasive), in participants who develop RSV LRTI or RSV-associated LRTC per the EAC's assessment will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Progressing to Respiratory Failure (of any Cause) Requiring Mechanical Ventilation (Invasive or Noninvasive)
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants progressing to respiratory failure (of any cause) requiring mechanical ventilation (invasive or noninvasive) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Supplemental Oxygen (O2) Free Days Through Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Number of supplemental O2 free days will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Supplemental Oxygen Requirement
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of supplemental oxygen requirement in participants will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Supplemental Oxygen
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of supplemental oxygen requirement in participants will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Respiratory Rate
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in respiratory rate as measured by the investigator during scheduled visits will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Heart Rate
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in heart rate as measured by the investigator during scheduled visits will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Peripheral Capillary Oxygen Saturation (SpO2)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in SpO2 as measured by the investigator during scheduled visits will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Body Temperature
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in body temperature as measured by the investigator during scheduled visits will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Hospitalized (of Participants who Were not Hospitalized at Baseline)
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants hospitalized (of participants who were not hospitalized at baseline) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Re-hospitalized
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants re-hospitalized (of participants who were hospitalized at baseline and discharged during the study and of participants who were not hospitalized at baseline, required hospitalization, and were discharged during the study) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Total Length of Hospital Stay
secondary_outcome.description: Total length of hospital stay (time in hospital from first dosing) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Total Time in the Intensive Care Unit (ICU)
secondary_outcome.description: Total time in the ICU (time in ICU from first dosing) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Grade 3 and Grade 4 Adverse Events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of Grade 3 and Grade 4 AEs will be assessed by system organ class where Grade 3: Severe and Grade 4: Life-threatening.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Respiratory AEs
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of respiratory AEs will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Thoracic-related AEs
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of thoracic-related AEs will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Antibiotic use in Participants who Develop and in Those who do not Develop RSV LRTI or RSV-Associated LRTC per the EAC's Assessment
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of antibiotic use in participants who develop and in those who do not develop RSV LRTI or RSV-associated LRTC per the EAC's assessment will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Resolution of Symptoms as Assessed by Respiratory Infection Intensity and Impact Questionnaire (RiiQ) Symptom Scale
secondary_outcome.description: Time to resolution of symptoms, assessed through an instrument for participant-reported symptoms (RiiQ Symptom Scale) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Severity of Symptoms Reported by Participants in the RiiQ Symptom Scale Through Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in severity of symptoms reported by participants in the RiiQ symptom scale through Day 28 will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Resolution of Respiratory Illness as Assessed by Patient Global Impression of Severity (PGI-S) Scale
secondary_outcome.description: Time to resolution of respiratory illness, through the PGI-S Scale, will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Patient Global Impression of Health (PGI-H) Scale Through Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in PGI-H scale through Day 28 will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Patient Global Impression of Change (PGI-C) Scale Through Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in PGI-C scale through Day 28 will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-time Curve from Time Zero to 24 Hours Postdose (AUC [0-24]) of JNJ-53718678
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours postdose (on Days 1 and 8)
secondary_outcome.description: AUC (0-24h) is defined as area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time 0 to 24 hours postdose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Trough Plasma Concentration (Ctrough) of JNJ-53718678
secondary_outcome.description: Ctrough is defined as the observed plasma concentration before dosing or at the end of the dosing interval.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of JNJ-53718678
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax is defined as the maximum observed plasma concentration of JNJ-53718678 in the dosing interval.

secondary_outcome.measure: Association of Plasma Concentration-time Data of JNJ-53718678 and Antiviral Activity
secondary_outcome.description: The potential association of plasma concentration-time data of JNJ-53718678 with antiviral activity (RSV viral kinetics) will be analyzed. Association will be analyzed using (non)-linear mixed-effects models in a tabular and/or graphical display.

secondary_outcome.measure: Association of Plasma Concentration-time Data of JNJ-53718678 and Safety Parameters
secondary_outcome.description: The potential association of plasma concentration-time data of JNJ-53718678 with selected safety (including AEs and laboratory abnormalities) parameters will be analyzed. Association will be analyzed using (non)-linear mixed-effects models in a tabular and/or graphical display.

secondary_outcome.measure: Association of Plasma Concentration-time Data of JNJ-53718678 and Clinical Outcomes
secondary_outcome.description: The potential association of plasma concentration-time data of JNJ-53718678 with clinical outcomes (proportion of participants developing LRTI) will be analyzed. Association will be analyzed using (non)-linear mixed-effects models in a tabular and/or graphical display.

secondary_outcome.measure: RSV Viral Load and Change from Baseline Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: RSV viral load and change from baseline over time will be measured by quantitative reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (qRT-PCR) assay in the mid-turbinate nasal swab specimens.

secondary_outcome.measure: RSV Viral Load AUC from Immediately Prior to First Dose of Study Drug (Baseline) Through Days 8, 11, 15, 22 and 28
secondary_outcome.description: RSV viral load AUC will be determined by quantitative qRT-PCR assay of nasal swabs.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Undetectable RSV Viral Load
secondary_outcome.description: Time to undetectable RSV viral load (per the detection limit of the assay used in the study) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants with Undetectable RSV Viral Load at Each Timepoint
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants with undetectable RSV viral load at each time point throughout the study will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline for the Health-related Quality of Life (HRQOL) as Assessed by 5-level EuroQol 5-Dimension (EQ-5D-5L) Through Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline for the HRQOL assessment as assessed through the EQ-5D-5L through Day 28 will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline for the HRQOL as Assessed by RiiQ Impact Scales Through Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline for the HRQOL assessment as assessed through RiiQ impact scales through Day 28 will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in the RSV F Gene Sequence
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in the RSV F gene sequence will be reported.

arm_group.description: Participants greater than or equal to (>=) 18 to less than or equal to (<=) 75 years of age will receive 250 milligram (mg) JNJ-53718678 twice daily (bid) for 21 days (without coadministration with moderate or strong CYP3A4 inhibitors), or 125 mg JNJ-53718678 bid for 21 days (coadministered with moderate or strong CYP3A4 inhibitors with the exception of posaconazole), or 125 mg once daily (qd) for 21 days (when coadministered with posaconazole), or matching placebo for 21 days.

Participants >=13 to <18 years of age will receive 250 mg JNJ-53718678 bid for 21 days (without coadministration with moderate or strong CYP3A4 inhibitors), or 125 mg JNJ-53718678 bid for 21 days (coadministered with moderate or strong CYP3A4 inhibitors with the exception of posaconazole), or 125 mg qd for 21 days (when coadministered with posaconazole), or matching placebo for 21 days.

intervention.description: JNJ-53718678 250 mg will be administered orally.
Matching placebo will be administered orally.
JNJ-53718678 125 mg will be administered orally.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Received an autologous or allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplant (HSCT) using any conditioning regimen
- Absolute lymphocyte count (ALC) less than (<) 1,000 cells/microliter (mL)
- Participant has laboratory confirmed RSV diagnosis within 48 hours of randomization
- New onset of at least 1 of the following respiratory symptoms within 4 days prior to the anticipated start of dosing nasal congestion, rhinorrhea, cough or pharyngitis (sore throat), and/or worsening of one of these chronic (associated with previously existing diagnosis, example, chronic rhinorrhea, seasonal allergies, chronic lung disease) respiratory symptoms within 4 days prior to the anticipated start of dosing
- Peripheral capillary oxygen saturation (SpO2) greater than or equal to (>=) 92 percent (%) on room air
Exclusion Criteria:
- Admitted to the hospital primarily for a lower respiratory tract disease of any cause as determined by the investigator
- Requires supplemental oxygen at Screening or any time between Screening and randomization
- Documented to be positive for other respiratory viruses (limited to influenza, parainfluenza, human rhinovirus, adenovirus, human metapneumovirus, or coronavirus) within 7 days prior to or at the Screening visit, if determined by local SOC testing (additional testing is not required)
- Clinically significant bacteremia or fungemia within 7 days prior to or at Screening that has not been adequately treated, as determined by the investigator

patient_data.ipd_description: The data sharing policy of the Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson is available at www.janssen.com/clinical trials/transparency. As noted on this site, requests for access to the study data can be submitted through Yale open Data Access (YODA) Project site at yoda.yale.edu
